00016 // defaults
00017 float x=50;   // [ug/cm*2]
00018 float dE=400; // [keV]
00019 const float Precision = 0.1; // [keV]
00020 
00021 
00022 int Usage(char *argv[])
00023 {
00024   cout << "\n Usage:" << argv[0] << "[-w <dwidth>][-e <energy>][-i][-s][-h][-x]" << endl;
00025   cout << "\n Description: " << endl;
00026   cout << "\t Convert energy deposit <Edep> in [keV] to kinetic energy <Ekin> of 12C " << endl;
00027   cout << "\t for given deadlayer thickness <dwidth> [ug/cm^2] in silicon. With invert " << endl;
00028   cout << "\t option -i, it calculates invert kinematics <Ekin> -> <Edep> for <dwidth>" << endl;
00029   cout << "\n Options:" << endl;
00030   cout << "\t -w <dwidth>  deadlayer width in [ug/cm^2]. Def:" << x << endl;
00031   cout << "\t -e <energy>  energy deposit (kinetic energy with -i option) in [keV]. Def:" 
00032        << dE << endl;
00033   cout << "\t -i           calculate invert kinematics. kinetic energy as input." << endl; 
00034   cout << "\t -s           show unit in output" << endl;
00035   cout << "\t -h \t      show this help    " << endl;
00036   cout << "\t -x \t      show example    " << endl;
00037   cout << endl;
00038   exit(0);
00039 
00040 }

00042 
00043 int Example(char *argv[])
00044 {
00045   cout << "\n Exapmle: " << endl;
00046   cout << "  1) Calculate <Ekin> for <Edep>=400 and <dwidth>=55 " << endl;
00047   cout << "\t" << argv[0] << " -e 400 -w 55 " << endl << endl;
00048   cout << "  2) Calculate <Edep> for <Ekin>=900 and <dwidth>=70 " << endl;
00049   cout << "\t" << argv[0] << " -e 900 -w 70 -i " << endl;
00050   cout << endl;
00051   exit(0);
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 //
00056 // Class name  : 
00057 // Method name : CalcInvertKinema
00058 //
00059 // Description : Scan dE from 1 [keV] and calcualte Kinetic energy <Ekin0>
00060 //             : until resulting <Ekin0> is close enough to desired value Ekin.
00061 // Input       : (float Ekin, float x)
00062 // Return      : dE
00063 //
00064 float CalcInvertKinema(float Ekin, float x)
00065 {
00066    float Ekin0 = 0;
00067    float dE = 1; // [keV]
00068    while (fabs(Ekin-Ekin0)>Precision) {
00069  
00070       Ekin0 = ekin(dE,x);
00071       dE += Precision;
00072       if (Ekin-Ekin0<0) return dE;
00073    }
00074  
00075    return dE;
00076 }
00077 
00078 
00079 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00080 {
00081    bool  InvertKinema = false;
00082    bool  ShowUnit = false;
00083    float Ekin;
00084    int   opt;
00085 
00086    while (EOF != (opt = getopt(argc, argv, "w:e:ishx?"))) {
00087       switch (opt) {
00088       case 'w':
00089          x=atof(optarg);
00090          break;
00091       case 'e':
00092          dE=atof(optarg);
00093          break;
00094       case 'i':
00095          InvertKinema = true;
00096          break;
00097       case 's':
00098          ShowUnit = true;
00099          break;
00100       case 'x':
00101          Example(argv);
00102          break;
00103       case 'h':
00104       case '?':
00105       case '*':
00106          Usage(argv);
00107       }
00108    }
00109       
00110    if (InvertKinema) {// Search dE close enough to resulting Ekin
00111       Ekin = dE; 
00112       dE = CalcInvertKinema(Ekin, x);
00113    }
00114    
00115    // Call Main routine
00116    Ekin = ekin(dE,x);
00117  
00118    // print results
00119    if (ShowUnit) {
00120       printf("=====================================================\n");
00121       printf("   Ekin[keV]   Edep[keV]  Eloss[keV]  dwidth[ug/cm^2]\n");
00122       printf("=====================================================\n");
00123    }
00124  
00125    float Eloss = Ekin - dE;
00126    printf("%12.2f%12.2f%12.2f%12.2f\n",Ekin,dE,Eloss,x);
00127  
00128    return 0;
00129 }
